resources.string: My Application
You are walking down the street and come across an old home. What will you do?
Go inside.
Keep walking.
You walk past the NO TRESPASSING sign into the dark house and begin exploring. When you the end of the hallway you see and a door that looks brand new.
Open the door see what is behind it.
Leave, someone is obviously still here.
As you keep walking past the house, you see a black cat that seems so be struggling.
You go see what is wrong.
Quickly avert your eyes and keep walking. Black cats are bad luck.
You open the door and their a stairs heading down. As you look down you see a faint light.
Go down the stairs and see what is down there.
You do not want to get caught trespassing so you leave.
You hurry out of the house and continue walking down the street. You hear something moving in the bush.
You use your phone flashlight to investigate.
Start running back home.
As you come near the cat you notice its just playing with a dead mouse.
Go inside.
Keep walking.
As you continue your walk, you notice a black car following you.
Stop and wait to see you it is. Then, yell at the to go away.
Run for your life.
